website_summaries.verdict: If you are hoping to clean mold and mildew stains without using any elbow grease, Star Brite’s hardcore solution does the heavy lifting; just spray and wipe it away.
pros: Easy to wipe clean without scrubbing
cons: Ancient mold and mildew stains may need multiple treatments

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results -- if you follow the directions to spray and wait and don't apply elbow grease while it's working
customer_reviews.text: The white and blue vinyl on our pontoon seats develops mildew because the high moisture after a rain, coupled with high temperatures under the cover is a perfect growth environment. We tried lots of cleaners over the years -- used much elbow grease but had poor results. We tried this product and at first we had similar, poor results, because we sprayed it on and started scrubbing and dried it. But -- after re-reading the directions -- we now just spray it on and let it sit. No rubbing. And like magic the mildew is gone. White and blue vinyl look like new. We do rinse the vinyl the next day, but not until the product has done its magic.
customer_reviews.author: Hersbruck

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my shower and it was worked really well I just sprayed the area and left it for about 10 minutes and wiped the area and the mildew was gone. The bottle says spray and rinse no scrubbing needed but I wiped the area and really tough spots did take some scrubbing but the product did what it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this product I did and my seats looked great for about a month they they started turning red and looking worse then ever... buyer beware!!! I used as directed. First 2 pics are after the last pic is before. Do not use this it will wreck your seats
customer_reviews.author: Matthew e Hlavsa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We have an old pontoon, and only cover it in the winter, so it gets gross. Most years I spend hours scrubbing it with bleach and water and a magic eraser... that barely makes a dent. Spayed Star Bright on, waited 10 minutes and used a couple microfiber cloths to wipe it off and rinse. Got 90% of mildew off the entire pontoon in about 45 minutes of light cleaning, and no scrub brush. Totally worth it! Some parts were almost black entirely (forgot to take pics) and it worked there too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! My tiles and shower curtain were shockingly horrible covered in dark mildew deposits. I sprayed the surfaces and returned to inspect in about an hour and about 80% of the yuck had disappeared with no rubbing. I sprayed what remained and returned in another hour and it was 100% clean looking. Rinsed it all with the shower hose - job done! Best of all there were no overwhelming fumes. I ’m so happy I found this! - this is an unpaid unbiased review
customer_reviews.author: Putters

customer_reviews.title: Really effective on grout stains
customer_reviews.text: I had really stubborn black mold stains in my white shower grout. Other products were not strong enough to get the stains out even with lots of scrubbing. This spray is STRONG. A lot of the stains started to fade as soon as I sprayed it on, and were almost completely gone with some light scrubbing. It really does a good job at penetrating the grout and getting the mold out of the material. The only thing I caution is the smell. Make sure you’re ventilating they space you’re working in...After I finished working with the spray, I walked outside and for about 15 min I felt lightheaded and had the smell of really strong bleach stuck in my nose
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Use Mold Armor house wash instead!
customer_reviews.text: To me, this stuff did not work. I have pontoon vinyl floor, Bimini top, seat covers. This stuff didn’t work. What does work? Of all things, a product made to clean your house called Mold Armor!! It got the 5 year old Vinyl pontoon floor looking new with almost NO scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: #N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Effortlessly removes mildew stains!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the hopes that it could make my poor golf cart seats look better, and hopefully avoid having to replace them. I'd tried lots of other cleaners, bleach, etc., with no meaningful results. But this product worked like a miracle! It got out years of mildew damage in minutes without effort! Just spray it on, wait 5 minutes, and rinse and wipe clean. It is literally THAT simple. I tried it on the top of the golf cart on the hard plastic with equally great results. Few things ever work as good as this does. I recommend wearing gloves and a mask; it's not something you will want to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Best ever mildew stain remover
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for boat upholstery and it worked like magic - it removed almost all of the stains. At one time or another I have used many different mildew stain removers for boat and household use and this is the best by far. It does have a strong smell and you will need good ventilation, but it is worth it to get the results. We also used it to remove mildew off of painted tongue and groove ceiling that was stained after a roof leak and it removed almost everything. There were a few very small spots left, but we had previously tried a couple of other products and this worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: summer girl

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Literally not an exaggeration to say this saved me $900. I have a few ripped seats on my boat that I’m going to have reupholstered this winter, but the rest of them were looking so bad I considered just having the entire boat reupholstered. Figured what the heck I’ll try this first. In about an hour of work I have managed to save at least 40% of my seats from needing reupholstery. Some of them will need a couple more passes, and a few are just beyond repair and will have to be replaced but overall this worked better than I could’ve hoped. I will be ordering another bottle today.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Completely misleading. Came up in shower mold cleaner search, described as mold remover but bottle only indicates mildew remover for boats and car upholstery. Not returnable. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: skibbie

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT on pop up camper canvas!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken before and after pictures to show just how awesome this product is! We bought a pop-up camper that needed some love. One side of the canvas (inside) was covered in mildew and it smelled BAD. I could not believe how easily this got rid of the mildew! I used a gentle scrub brush after applying the product, then a wet sponge to wipe afterwards. I recommend wearing gloves that keep liquid out, and if you’re going to working in an area you have to reach over/above head, wear eye protection and cover any fabric below. The canvas in our camper looks very clean now and it smells SO much better.
customer_reviews.author: pinkash

customer_reviews.title: This product is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Most mundane consumer products are not worth a review, but that is certainly not the case for this! It absolutely works as advertised and then some. I put this on a three to four year old outdoor cushion that was ready for the recycling bin and, after about 10-15 minutes of soaking, it was absolutely like new, with zero color loss. I couldn't believe it! Then, I put it on my expensive outdoor furniture to remove some mold and green slime with exactly the same result! This is the cheapest, most effective outdoor furniture cleaner I have ever tried, by far!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Mawson

customer_reviews.title: Will make your boat vinyl look brand new, for real
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically a Bleach spray bit it won’t hurt your vinyl like bleach products will. This stuff is amazing. I never thought a product could do this. Look at the pics. 1999 boat that was in good condition but the vinyl gets stained after so many years. The cabin and cockpit upholstery looks brand new. It does smell like bleach but it’s a clean smell and goes away in a few minutes. I use it on my other boat every time I go to the lake and my upholstery looks brand new. This was better than the useless $750 steamer I bought too :(
customer_reviews.author: Enginepy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really leave reviews but I felt compelled on this one... this stuff worked great! I’ve bleached and muscled and used other products with quite a bit of physical effort to clean my boat upholstery every couple of years. I let my boat sit up and thought I needed to replace all the upholstery. I sprayed this stuff on and rinsed with a hose. My upholstery is sparkling and bright again. Very little effort required. Some spots required 2 coats hit are clean. This stuff is awesome. Took 1.5 bottles to do my 24 ft ski boat
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ingles

customer_reviews.title: AMAZEBALLS
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE AND AFTER PICTURES INCLUDED WOW!!! ALL I CAN SAY IS BUY THIS PRODUCT AND YOU WONT REGRET IT! BOUGHT THIS SPECIFICALLY FOR MY CAR AS I NOTICED THERE WAS A SPOT WHERE THERE WAS A STAIN.. IT LOOKED LIKE A MOLD! I WAS FREAKING OUT!!! I BOUGHT THIS RIGHT AWAY! IT WORKED! CONS: SMELL - but hey... it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!! Magic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner made my boat seats look brand new. I had mildew on white seats that was years old. This removed all of that. My seats literally look new. Im absolutely thrilled. This stuff is liquid magic. Spray it on and let it soak five minutes then hose it off. Very little scrubbing was needed. I just rinsed and sprayed it again, waited and rinsed again on super tough spots.
customer_reviews.author: Gaeljo

customer_reviews.title: Worked Ok
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok, Used this to get the mildew stains from the white silicone sealant on the boat and it got most of it out and lightened the rest but it didn't remove them completely so I will probably have to rip out and replace the sealer. I did notice though that after using the cleaner and seeing the results and then looking at it again the next day the stains were lighter the next day even though we rinsed the solution off. It may work great for you it all depends on the type of stain and the surface it on. Star Brite Products have never disappointed me so I am giving it the benefit of the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Great Awning Cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works, and it works fast! Our awning was a mess from ambient moisture while sitting in storage. Just a few squirts and the transformation began. It took about a bottle and a half to really clean the 17’ awning with mostly light mildew on it. Our camper dealer recommended this product and it did not disappoint. Beware! This cleaner contains bleach and it drips after spraying, so wear an old shirt and hat. My husband also used a soft brush on a long handle to brush the cleaner onto all parts of the underside of the awning. The awning looks brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: DrBob

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works! I've had mold on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I've had mold on my bathroom ceiling for months due to no ventilation. I've tried scrubbing (hard to do) and nothing removed it completely; that is until now. It melted mildew away right before my eyes. Finally, truth in advertising!
customer_reviews.author: CampGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vinyl Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is amazing. Used it on a moldy, white vinyl boat seat. Let sit for just a minute. Used a gentle scrub brush and just like that seat looked new. I wore gloves and rinsed the cleanser away. It also removed scrapes and markings on the hull. I did not let that sit but rinsed as soon as I scrubbed. Great product! The cleanser is not thick and runs so be wary of other surfaces and colored vinyl. Test an inconspicuous spot for dyed materials.
customer_reviews.author: Victa

customer_reviews.title: Works well on mildew, but is bleach
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use spray and worked well on some old mildew on our vinyl boat seats, but make sure you have water and a rag handy to wipe it off when you've finished. This contains some sort of bleach alternative. Make sure you are very careful where you aim the spray. I had some overspray land on a dark sweatshirt and it caused bleach stains in a matter of minutes. Very potent. Might work better as a gel that it applied with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: So happy I could cry!
customer_reviews.text: It worked so good I could cry! Lol. Seriously though, I am SOOO happy and can’t believe how well this stuff works. I tried everything and almost gave up before finding this. Thank you for making this product, you saved my boat seats!!
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: This is the stuff that really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy strong! This arrived a few days back but I hadn't used it until yesterday. My wife was trying to remove the sticky wax accumulated on our gas range surface but it wasn't coming off. Although this guy is marketed more for bathroom n vinyl, I thought I'll try it on the surface. Just sprayed it a little and let it settle for 2-4 mins. Then took a tissue to wipe and see what's going on. Baammm!! All the sticky stains came off. The surface is as clean as it could get. Beautiful stuff! Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronak Gavandi

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD MOLD REMOVER - NOT PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I just used this stuff on my boat over the 4th of July weekend and for the most part it did get rid of 85% of the mold and mildew. My boat sat undercover all winter long and the seats and sundeck where nasty. I can still see spots on the vinyl and that is a little discouraging. BUT, this stuff did a good job of getting rid of the majority of the mold and mildew; even in the cracks and crevices . Perhaps my expectations are to high? Overall, I'm glad I bought the 2 bottles and cleaned 2 seats and the sundeck. This stuff goes fast if you have a big job!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great mildew remover for boat
customer_reviews.text: Works great - boat upholstery looks like new after sitting and mildewing all winter. Before I bought this I tried other household mold and mildew removers but without much luck, and I was getting nervous that the boat was going to look nasty forever. But I am very pleased with the result. Slightly smelly; I should have opened more of the top of the boat than I did, and now my nose feels like I've been swimming in a public pool.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works on the purple mildew on boat vinyl
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat with cushions or vinyl, you have seen the black or purplish looking mildew that bleach will not get out no matter how much you use. Magic Erasers, acetone, nothing works.. This stuff got it off in 5 minutes, I could not believe it. I am on a rave about this product. It's a little pricey but let me tell you, it works. I highly recommend it to boaters and anyone having the problem of the etched in black or purple mildew. It will remove it! Easy 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A MIRACLE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - I can't believe it!!!!! I was on the verge of replacing my Sunbrella umbrella (very expensive), and all the matching chair cushions, almost black in some spots from our 100% FL, summer humidity. Then I saw this product that specifically said it worked on Sunbrella fabric without fading or discoloration........IT WORKS!!!!! (Just wait about 15 - 20 minutes). I just reordered the gallon size.....WOW!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith H.

customer_reviews.title: Actually gets the old mold and mildue stains out of boat seats
customer_reviews.text: I have used everything to combat mold and mildew on my boats leaning post in the muggy Coastal Georgia climate. Nothing has taken out the old stains that were embedded. Even my blue rubber CC drivers floor mat was so mildew stained black that even pure bleach and vicarious brushing wouldn't take it out. This stuff did...no brushing required!! I am so impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aiink

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so well. I had put a classroom parachute away wet. When I opened it up this spring it was covered in black spots. I washed it several time with bleach and it didn’t even fade the spots. We sprayed this on (outside cause of the smell) and within minutes the spots were gone. No scrubbing or wiping! We did washed it a few times after to remove the chemical smell but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth kt
customer_reviews.text: Used to attempt to clean a canvas boat cover of mildew stains. I saw zero difference before and after which is unfortunate because this is semi expensive. A $2 a bottle cleaner called “greased lighting” from the dollar general did a way better job.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. If you need a cleaner for mild spotting or clean up after winter storage, this is a good product. If you have an entrenched stain, i'd look around some more. My Sea-Doo seat has a mildew stain. The seat fabric is definitely part of my problem - i'm not entirely disappointed with Star Brite - but it didn't help me out so this wouldn't be my first choice again for anything serious.
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! I first bought a small bottle to test it out and then I purchased a gallon, it's that good! The secret is to leave it sprayed on at least 10 minutes minimum! I used it on our boat seats and it cleaned off all of the winter mildew from being covered! Honestly I underestimated how long 10 minutes was so really, keep track of time! Let the cleaner do the job in the time it needs. Tough spots took a couple of times, but it was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: magic mildew remover, very little effort
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is AWESOME. we bought a 10 year old pop up camper that was covered with mildew and it literally just melted away in a few minutes with this stuff. barely had to scrub any areas. use gloves bc it smells pretty toxic! we laid the canvas out flat on the driveway, sprayed it, let it sit for 10 min then lightly scrubbed bad areas and washed it all off with dish soap and water. looks like a brand new camper!!! thank you for this awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morgan

customer_reviews.title: If you own a boat you should have a bottle of this on hand...period!
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat and don’t keep a bottle of this on hand then you’re probably working way too hard on cleaning the seats. This stuff is amazing! You don’t even have to scrub. Just spray it on, let it sit for about 8-10 minutes and then hose it off. Our seats were black with mildew in the spring. I thought we would never get them to look good again. This stuff made them look just like new all over again...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing to Remove Mildew on Tile
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on all the positive reviews to treat mildew stains on my tile floor. It smelled very strong, very similar to Clorox Mold and Mildew cleaner; however, it did nothing but send a strong smell through the house. I even scrubbed the spot as recommended but still nothing. I paid double for a cleaner that may work at the same strength as a Clorox product. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: It works like magic
customer_reviews.text: I used this on our pontoon seats we purchased a 2007 pontoon seats all had mold on tops and sides. I used as directed, kept massaging the product in as I did a 2 ft section. OMG it worked so well, it was extremely windy out so I wanted product to stay wet and activated after about 4 min each section I did looked amazing. Well worth every penny. Try before you use anything else. Thank you Starbrite !!!
customer_reviews.author: D, MC

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY product that works this well.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a boater all my life and have tried A LOT of different cleaning products. Anyway, we had a very wet winter last year and ended up getting mold spots on the white uphostry. My wife was heartbroken and a little dejected when I told her about my past experiences trying to get rid of the mold spots. I've tried products that just didnt work, or the spots came back after a week or two. In the Spring we ordered. We started with a light spray and it was like magic. The mold spots just disappeared! It's now early Fall and the spots have not reappeared!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use on shower. Minimum mold. Use as directed. Did not do anything for it. Applied twice and scrubbed and still nothing. Waste of money. Would not recommend. Also very strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: BOSS

customer_reviews.title: Mildew removal & Brighter
customer_reviews.text: Pic on left is before treatment ,pic on right after treatment. Spray on let set a couple of minutes ,i used a little green machine to rinse off and vacume at the same time. Worked great on mildew removal and brighten colors on my polyester $350 patio set on my screen porch in South Carolina, very humid climate here. Definitely worth a try ,good luck.
customer_reviews.author: SLIMJIM

customer_reviews.title: It gets rid of mold and mildew on boat seats
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I had seat cushions on my boat that were covered in mold from just being stored and wet under the seats. I sprayed this stuff on and within 5 minutes it had disappeared and I just rinsed it off. I wish I would have taken before and after pics, but this stuff is awesome. I'm guessing it will work in showers and other places just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Is this stuff made in a secret fairy mountain ha ha!! I had a white boat bumper that had turned mostly black and this stuff brought it back to white!!! I use it on my boat cushions, it takes the mildew off in less than 2-3 minutes! I use it on my vinyl siding to remove mildew, I just spray, scrub with a brush let sit 1/2 hour then rinse! Cleanest house in the woods! This will take mildew off anything!! Buy it just for fun, it is incredible to watch it work. Especially after using vinegar and rubbing alcohol, a lot of elbow grease with that! No elbow grease with this!!! Wear gloves! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Strong - Both Cleaning Power and Oder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is strong, kills the mildew and fungus but has a very, very strong oder. It does a great job but make sure the bathroom vent fan/fans is ON or you will be affected by the fumes - not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: MKR Service

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well I bought a gallon. We have colored non-slip deck, very rough and attracts mold. The mold has been embedded for at least 3 years and we have tried everything including Clorox straight, with very little luck. Spray this on and let it sit for a couple of minutes. and then scrub, scrub, scrub. It took 5 hours of scrubbing to clean a 41 foot sailboat, but it is done. Interesting to note that it didn't discolor the sunbrella canvas and it cleaned vinyl cushions without scrubbing. Wear gloves, and rinse well. A great addition to really clean your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Captian Thursday

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I was expecting, but this was above and beyond. I figured it would at least take several rounds of spraying and scrubbing, but within minutes my hammock started looking like that after picture. I did one additional round of spraying, but no scrubbing was necessary to get this result. Very impressed and so happy to have a pretty hammock again.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Really does work. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually amazing. I wish I had taken a picture. I sprayed my whole boat this afternoon and within 5 minutes it was spotless. It was really bad before the spray. Two years under cover was not good to my seats. They were covered black spots. I tried to pressure wash them without much success. This product really works. I just bought another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Presson

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is miraculous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used hybrid camper last fall. A hybrid is a hard shell with canvas pop outs on one or both ends. Since it is not new, it had mold/mildew on the canvas ends. After much research, I settled on this product. Put in a spray bottle and to work I went. As instructed, I sprayed it on the areas and let it erase the spots. Sprayed off the outside areas with water. The inside areas I used a bucket of water and towels to rinse off. As the title states, it miraculously got rid of the stains. I will have to say I was rather skeptical. After using this stuff, I am AMAZED! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one that works!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than this stuff works. It does take some elbow grease, and requires 2nd applications to the toughest parts. But... it works, and that is what matters to me! Note: I just found out that they now make a gel spray. It think that would even be better as it would be easier to use, and not run. Still 5 stars for this one!
customer_reviews.author: SherpaK

customer_reviews.title: It does not work on flagstone
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I was too optimistic. The product says it will remove strains off of any surface. We have a grille that stands on an elevated flagstone platform where grease occasionally drips down and stains it. This product did not work at all, but a neighbor suggested using Lysol Toilet Bowl Cleaner on these stains and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.  Brown

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor chair cushions got ugly, black mildew stains over the summer and nothing that I tried washing them in took the stains out. I ordered this product, but when I received it the bottle said not for use on fabric. I was so disappointed, but I thought what the heck, the cushions were already ruined by the black stains so I went ahead and tried it. It took out the black stains and my cushions look like new! I am so glad that I bought this product and I've even more glad that I went ahead and used it on my chair cushions. Wow. This stuff really worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rinne

customer_reviews.title: Projector Screen Saved!
customer_reviews.text: This product did everything it said it would do and I was extremely skeptical. My projector screen was unintentionally left in the Florida weather for 6 months. Mildew had covered the entire screen and I was ready to throw it out and buy another. While watching a YouTube video on another subject, this product came up and I decided to give it a try because it was cheaper than a $150 screen. I followed the directions, sprayed on and let sit for a couple of minutes until the mildew was gone. I rinsed with a garden hose sprayer and true to the advertisement, it was gone. See for yourself in the photos I uploaded. I am simply amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Al Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Clears mildew with no effort! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: AmAzInG!!!!!!!!!!!! We had some moisture build up over last winter and our pontoon captain chairs got slightly mildewed. I tinkered with it all boating season but never got it off. I found this product and while cleaning for winterizing our boat this year, I sprayed this on and by the time I grabbed a cloth to wipe it off the mildew was gone, no wiping/scrubbing necessary. This is a truly great product!
customer_reviews.author: KRSPA-C

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on bounce house/water slide!
customer_reviews.text: Bought an inflatable water slide last summer. We didn’t dry it out enough before we put it away. When we opened this summer it was covered in mildew. I sprayed an area and walked away for 15 minutes. This is the result. No wiping or scrubbing. I’m going to spray the rest, rinse and do another clean with some antibacterial solution. I had previously tried cleaning this with dish soap, bleach and power washing. All made no difference.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: By the way use old clothing during the cleaning process this cleaner is just like bleach. I give it a thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my tent trailer to remove black mold spots . This product definetly works , you just spray let it soak scrub with a towel or brush . And watch the spots come right off . The mold spots I had were about 2 years old . By the way use old clothing during the cleaning process this cleaner is just like bleach . I give it a thumbs up .
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I won't be surprised if with a little more time it does even better. I've got some cloth I'm going to try ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but this deserves it! I've got a shower stall that doesn't get much light or air and started developing mildew in one corner. When I purchased this I thought, "yeah right, I'll give it a shot." Sprayed it and walked away, forgetting about it, strolled back in 5 minutes later remembering I'd treated it and the stains were 90% gone, that's a victory as far as I'm concerned. I won't be surprised if with a little more time it does even better. I've got some cloth I'm going to try next, I'll be shocked if it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Canoe Guy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many mildew stain removers over the years, most of which don't work. However, I've had good luck with Starbrite products over the years so I thought I'd give it a try on my boat vinyl. The first time I used it, I let it sit till it dried up and then rinsed it. The mildew was still there. I thought, another waste of money. A week or so later I was on my boat and to my surprise all of the mildew was gone! Very happy with this product. I also use Starbrite Mildew Block about once a month.
customer_reviews.author: LowPressure

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to use. I bought this to try to clean the mildew on the tan part of my cat’s outdoor “playpen.” Unfortunately I didn’t take a before photo, but trust me there was mildew spots all over the tan canvas. It looks brand new again. Then we used it on our plastic storage bench and we were just amazed. The bench was bad so we applied, waited a bit and then used a scrub brush. For the cat pen I simply sprayed and waited and hosed it off. I tested it on my white seat cushions and it worked beautifully. Just ordered a gallon.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Can't believe thats the same top!
customer_reviews.text: Used this without much hope of it working on my 30+ tear old pontoon boat Bimini top. The photos don't do justice to how funky this top was. It was covered in mildew. I sprayed this stuff on and before I could get to the bottom the top was cleaning up WAY beyond my expectations. I sprayed the whole thing and I think the results speak for themselves. My only regret is that I didn't buy 2 more when I bought this one. You will be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Frailicks

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: Our boat is kept on at our dock on the florida gulf coast so it never gets a break from the rain, humidity and sun. It's an effort to keep up on it's upholstery. This product is as good as others. Nothing special. The reviews led me to believe it was above par. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jent

customer_reviews.title: This Is The Only Cleaner That Has Worked
customer_reviews.text: After trying about a dozen mold and mildew “removers” I decided to try this. My golf cart has developed serious mildew stains from some unusually damp weather last year. Seemed my only option was to have the seats recovered. Well, as the title states, Star Brite came to the rescue. It took a couple of applications and a little scrubbing but, at least 85-90% of the stains are gone. I think another shot at it will get rid of most of the remaining stains. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jneed53

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MIRACLE STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I've used this now on my plastic shower curtains and bathroom tiles that had mildew grown on/in it, in the kitchen sink that had some really old and tough stains and on the kitchen counter tiles. I kid you not, I have never seen my kitchen and shower shine so bright. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this on boat canvas and seats. Though the canvas was extremely dirty and grimy, it did remove a lot of it with some additional scrubbing. The canvas didn't come completely clean but you can sure notice the difference. On the seats; cleaned them like no tomorrow. Would definitely buy again. I’ve purchased again, it works do well. This time I tried in the bathroom, great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this really works
customer_reviews.text: Have been dealing with darkened grout in large, separated, hard to clean shower. Sprayed, waited a minute or two, the used my power scrubber (also bought from Amazon), and it actually looks CLEAN! Hallelujah! I would not have needed the scrubber except it makes it easier to reach for me given large shower and my age. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Cos

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than Tilex - same product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my boat last year. This year I didn't order again & just ran to the store to buy generic Tilex. The generic tilex was under $2 and was arguably better than this. Wanted to save others money & let them know of the alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Weiss

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had black mold in my tub/ shower that I couldn't remove after trying several bathroom/ multi purpose cleaners. I came across this product and decided to try it with no expectations. I literally just sprayed it on and walked away, came back a few minutes later expecting to have to start scrubbing and to my surprise the mold had vanished!! I also used it on the green mold that stains the outside of my gutters and after a light scrubbing the stains were gone. Happy with it but wish it wasn't so expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: HollyinHI

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works like magic! Last year we scrubbed on our white pontoon boat seats for 2 days. With this product, we sprayed it on from a small hand held bottle. It began to work almost immediately so by the time the entire boat was sprayed, we came back around and begin to wipe it off. It took another spray or 2 on some of the worse places and we also used a magic eraser on areas requiring more than one application. Be sue to rinse it off well and we dried it to before storing our boat for the winter. I’ve alread shared this product with friend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I tried literally 8 different cleaners to remove the mildew on the seats of the boat I just bought. Years of neglect gone in a couple minutes. All the other cleaners with some being "professional grade" could only clean the seats to the level in the first picture. I'm tell anyone that will listen how great this stuff is.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Barbe

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was skeptical about spraying this product on our boat and letting it sit. However, it really worked - no scrubbing necessary! Simply spray the product on the vinyl, let it sit out in the sun, and the mildew will disappear. Difficult spots might take more than one treatment. My only complaint is that we used all of one bottle for one treatment, which seemed a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: jnoelle

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. I had mildew stains on my boat cushions. We were debating getting them recovered, but decided to try this first. I sprayed it on one spot just to see if it worked. I left it and came back a few minutes later to find most of the mildew was gone. A second spray and the stain was gone. I can’t wait to do the entire boat. Buying a second bottle in case I run out
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is expensive concentrated bleach with a surfactant. However, it is worth the price! I used it to remove mildew stains from an RV awning and the top of a travel trailer. Most applications will not require any brushing/scrubbing. Just keep the area moist with product until stain is gone, then rinse. Regarding the price, it's a matter of your time and effort being worth the price of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael, Charleston, SC

customer_reviews.title: Great for boat seats / vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results on my vinyl fishing boat seats. Removed built up mildew and related stains with ease. Spray, allow to sit for a few minutes, then, wipe off. May need to repeat a few times for deep-seated mildew stains, but results are good. There is a smell of bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Borowski

customer_reviews.title: Star Brite!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks, it really gets mold and mildew stains off things. We get a couple bottles each year for our lake house. Spray everything down with this, let it sit a few minutes then wipe it off with a soapy rag. Gets off stuff the power washer will leave behind like stains
customer_reviews.author: dls322

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Watch out where you spray it though.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and works great! Just a word of caution... I used this product to clean the awning on our RV and it dripped down the side of the camper and faded the paint and left streaks. I even rinsed the over spray biut that wasn't enough. So, just be careful to only apply it to materials that won't fade. The awning came out amazingly sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This worked OK on my mildew-stained boat seats, but the product smells like bleach and I'm concerned about it staining the carpet or clothing. It removed most of the mildew from my seats with lots and lots of elbow grease, but is no more effective than a Mr. Clean Magic Eraser, which doesn't contain bleach. I won't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska reader

customer_reviews.title: Persistence Pays Off
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well, although it did not completely remove all discoloration and it took a little more work then advertised. I used this on my ATV seat. Here is what I had to do. Applied and scrubbed multiple times for 5 minutes, then rinsed. Applied and waited 10 minutes, then scrubbed. Re-applied and waited another 10 minutes, then scrubbed again. Re-applied and waited another 10 minutes, scrubbed one last time, and then rinsed and dried off. All said and done, I would buy this product again and would also recommend it due to its results at its price point. Well worth the money. See attached photos for results.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to remove the mildew from my 94 Miata vinyl top. I was really surprised at how well this stuff works. It was recommended on a Miata forum, and it did the job, and took little effort. My top looks brand new now. I'm impressed. I'll definitely recommend this for the purpose I purchased it for. Only complaint I have is the bottle doesn't have a mist setting. It's just a steady stream, but it's not the worst thing in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Vershure

customer_reviews.title: You want clean, you got clean
customer_reviews.text: One bottle totally cleaned our vinyl shed in 10 minutes. Spray on , wait and rinse. 100% effective! One hint. The nozzle you can turn to desired flow. Pick the thick mist , it penetrates better and you can make the bottle last longer. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: tffrph

customer_reviews.title: This really works...used on multiple years of mildew buildup
customer_reviews.text: We used this on the seats of a pontoon boat that had accumulated mildew/mold from several years. I was skeptical, but the reviews of this product convinced me that maybe we might see some improvement. I had originally tried another boat product and a pressure washer and saw absolutely no improvement. I then sprayed this product on one seat, went and hooked up the pressure washer and came back to rinse off the product about 5 minutes later. Unbelievable! Not only was the mildew gone, but the true color of the seats showed through with the removal of general grime. I have now ordered one additional spray bottle and a gallon refill.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hill

customer_reviews.title: Top Wafer Seal Was Broken; Leaked Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I needed this product right away to clean the bimini top on our boat before a longer vacation. Product arrived quickly but the small interior box holding the sprayer and bottle was soaked. No physical appearance of damage. The wafer seal under the cap was leaking and approx 1/4 cup of product came out. Overall great product just frustrated with the packaging aspect and receiving less than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: It’s just bleach
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed that this has so much bleach in it. I could make a bleach and water solution myself. I was told by my grout man that bleach just makes the mold stains soak into the grout. I will never use this again so I threw it out. =[
customer_reviews.author: TinaN

customer_reviews.title: There must be witches in the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My pontoon seats and plastic looked terrible. I bought this and used it a year later, I didn’t have much hope, but it worked like magic! I sprayed it on, then hit it with a round brush in my cordless drill. Seats look like new!
customer_reviews.author: R. Spohr

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle!!! I used it on two outdoor couch cushions that I thought I’d need to throw away and replace because they were covered in unsightly mold. I sprayed it on, came back 15 minutes later, and all of the mold and mildew was GONE!! It was like I had bought brand new cushions! This saved me so much money and I plan to buy multiple bottles as back up now. I had no issues with bleaching the color from the cushions using this either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same type product by Tilex for less cost at Wally World
customer_reviews.text: Less than half price for a larger quantity of the same type of product available in the House Cleaning aisle at Wally World. Produces the same results for far less expense and with a greater volume of product but don't buy the store brand cause it doesn't clean as well as the Tilex does.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: I had those black spots that come from internal mold all over my boat seats. I had tried everything, to no avail. Nothing worked. I bought this....sprayed on and waited for the inevitable disappointment. I was amazed to find the spots GONE! It took awhile, and there were some that required two applications, but thanks to this product, all the black spots on my boat are long gone
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good RV awning cleaner
customer_reviews.text: During a rainfall water will enter the end of the awning on my RV. Over time this creates a mildew stain on the awning. This cleaner did a great job at removing the stain. I just sprayed it on and wiped it off with a cloth. Pretty easy process and my awning looks new again!
customer_reviews.author: In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Had some mildew issues on a “new to us” boat. This stuff made the cushions look brand new. Very little, if any, elbow grease required!! Also used it in an enclosed area that had some mildew buildup on the fiberglass. Worked great but beware of the fumes.
customer_reviews.author: charles ball

customer_reviews.title: This product container was not sealed and it was leaking. Value diminshed due to product loss.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great produce for cleaning boat mildew. Caution when opening the package you can get on your hands and spill it on something that may cause stains. The plastic outer bag was also not a tight seal and in was leaking into the inner box where the card box was soaking it up. The box was left on it side and if it would have remained in that position for 24 hrs there would have been a considerable amount of produce lost (approximately 2 pints). I am considering asking for a refund or return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I did before and after pics. Used on 19 foot rv awning that was getting moldy from humid weather in Tennessee. Mostly a bleach solution but it worked great! Make sure to wear clothes that can be destroyed if working overhead lol!
customer_reviews.author: Slowbrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We used this product on our RV Awning - it was absolutely miraculous! We had lots of black mold on the underside. Initially I sprayed a small area, rubbed gently and rinsed it off. It got some mold. I let that dry and the next day I sprayed the entire underside, rolled the awning back up for an hour. Came back out unrolled and sprayed and it and the mold was 100% gone. What a lifesaver - highly recommended for cleaning the awning underside.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Work Smart not Hard
customer_reviews.text: Tried several things to clean up vinyl boat seats and worked my fingers to the bone with zero success. Bought this product and a few minutes, a shop rag and a garden hose, seats look great again. The only reason I broke a sweat was because it was hot outside. Don't waste your time, get this stuff and gunk be gone!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Crump

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a 3 year old camper awning that hadn’t been cleaned since new. Sprayed it on. Let it soak about 5 minutes. Used the extension brush I have for washing the camper the scrub it really quick, but it probably didn’t need the scrub because everything came right off. Rinsed with the hose & it looks brand new. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so hard to control the mold in my showers and this stuff is MAJIC. I sprayed it on and could see the difference within an hour. I left it on for a few hours (close the bathroom door) and it still looks great three weeks later!
customer_reviews.author: boy's mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the cleaner that you want if you want to get mildew stain off of your boat's vinyl upholstery.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cleaner that you want if you want to get mildew stain off of your boat's vinyl upholstery. I've tried several other cleaners and none came close to Star Brite. Just spray it on, wait a couple of minutes, and rinse it off - just like the instructions say. You might have to give really tough stains a second spray and occasionally a light scrubbing with a soft brush, but the majority of the stain will just melt away. Make sure you rinse it well as the chlorine in the cleaner could damage the fabric stitching if it's not rinsed. Recommend that you buy the gallon bottle and save $5.00!
customer_reviews.author: Bass Man

customer_reviews.title: ... packed up during a sudden storm) and it looked horrible. I bought this praying it would work
customer_reviews.text: We had a bouncy house that got mildew all over it ( it had to be quickly packed up during a sudden storm) and it looked horrible. I bought this praying it would work. This is a wonderful product!!!! I wish I could give it more then 5 stars!!! 90% of the mildew stains are gone and they covered almost our entire bouncy house. There are a few stubborn stains that just wouldn’t come out completely. I have to buy another bottle so I can finish cleaning because I ran out. I also want a bottle on hand in case this happens again. I just wish I had taken before and after pictures!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Matsook

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, not knock-off cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of cleaners for my pontoon seats/surfaces and nothing beast this stuff! Do yourself a favor and just buy it verses all the bleach and other eco-friendly stuff - they do not compare to Star Bright!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell but works flawlessly and got mold out of everything. Ballet shoes, bag, tights, leotard. After lemonade spilled inside bag and was left for a month. Got everything out like new again. May have to repeat. But works great!
customer_reviews.author: SAMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Made boat cushions look new
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as it said it would. Tried several products before using this to remove the black mildew stains from boat seats. Used this and in minutes the cushions look brand new. Used on patio cushions and had the same success.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: This Works Where Others Have Not
customer_reviews.text: I had mildew stains on vinyl boat cushions. Tried 3M Mildew Stain Remover to no avail. Bought this...worked great. I have always found Starbrite products to be a cut above the rest and this is no exception
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of other products in my life and by far this one was the most over priced for what it was supposed to do. Put it on, waited and it only lightened up a little bit. Spay, wait, rinse and repeat and repeat. Would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just awesome. I have used it on a popup camper and my parent's pontoon boat. Within an hour of applying it, the vinyl looks like new! No stains and easy to clean up. It is no wonder the local boat marina keeps this stuff stocked on their shelves. Star brite, you have gained a lifelong customer ... just don't change the formula! A+
customer_reviews.author: Funky Bunch

product_meta.title: Star Brite Mold & Mildew Stain Remover + Cleaner – Lifts Dirt & Removes Mildew Stains on Contact
feature_bullets: Quickly removes stains caused by mold & mildew on contact without heavy scrubbing; EASY TO USE - spray, wait until the stain disappears, then rinse

STAIN REMOVER + CLEANER: High-alkaline, triple-action formula contains; BUFFERED-BLEACH to remove mold stains & mildew stains; CHELATING AGENTS to lift ground-in dirt; SURFACTANTS to cut grease & grime
BUFFERED-BLEACH TECHNOLOGY is better suited for marine/outdoor upholstery and outdoor acrylic fabrics including Sunbrella; Won't harm stitching or threads
More effective cleaning power than unbuffered "bleach-water" based products, or diluted supermarket brands
Works on; awnings, fiberglass, wood, concrete, drywall, siding, tile & grout, gutters, roofs, vinyl upholstery, most outdoor acrylic fabrics, and more *(test fabric for colorfastness before use)
Professional-strength, concentrated formula for boats, homes, RVs, and commercial use
Star brite products are proudly made in the USA since 1973

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
